features: 【Basic parameters】— 12-pack of Bevigor lithium 3000mAh 1.5V with light weight（15g/1pc）life-span(10 years) AA batteries, perfect to power your electronic devices, remote controls and other household appliances. Bevigor provide extremely perfect packaging and strong storage time. Prevent accidental drop or short circuit, and provide more secure protection for the battery. 10-year battery storage life for long-term backup energy.

【More safety &Leak-proof】—Three-layer safety and leak-proof design. Explosion-proof valve, anti-short-circuit valve, leak-proof sealing ring. And use of spiral wound battery technology can effectively prevent liquid from battery to leaking or damage the device (based on standard usage). Is the best choice for high-end electronic products.

【Wide adaptable temperature】—Performs perfectly in extreme environments . Cold resistance surpasses alkaline batteries and nickel-metal hydride batteries. Works well from -40F to 140 ° F and is suitable for both outdoor and indoor use.

【Wide application】—Perfect for both high and low drain devices, such as digital cameras, vr controllers, 4WD speed RC car toys, LED flashlight clocks, emergency lantern, LED candle,portable radio, cassette recorder, solar lights, baby toys, mouse, remote controls and so on.
【WHAT YOU GET】-A full box of 12PACK AA batteries. Impressive packing, easy to store and avoid short circuit. Our worry-free 3-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Correction: I have since confirmed that the one camera is consuming more battery juice than the other. The camera has a defect, not the batteries. My other camera has lasted quite a while with these batteries. These batteries seem to be a quality product.Original Review: I put 12 batteries in a one trail camera and they are still working fine after a month including below zero weather. That camera still showing 100%. I put 12 batteries in my other trail camera and after 2 weeks they are dead. Was trying Lithium for cold winter weather but it wasn't worth my investment. Sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second box in a year and a half. I use them in my Blink cameras (do NOT buy those cameras). These batteries have lasted the best for me with these camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These batteries work well
reviews.reviewText: These batteries are a good replacement for the energizer brand lithium batteries. I know lithium is currently in high demand but the energizer brand is just not affordable anymore. These Bevigor brand offer a better price and last almost as long. More importantly, they offer the power that you need to run your electronic devices for more than a few hours. They also make an ultra version which is more expensive but still less than the other brand. The Bevigor ultra actually are more powerful and therefore last longer too. Bottom line , they provide the same power and usage time as the big brand name lithium batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my Blink Cameras
reviews.reviewText: Bought these as the life span of the batteries that came with my Blink Cameras has ended. Great priced and work great so far as a replacement even in cold weather Iowa.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought a pack of the AA and also the AAA. I assume they are basically the same product with the same standards.I had the AAA version of the same brand from my first box fail prematurely while inside my Sig Romeo5 XDR Rifle Optic. The rifle was never fired with the new battery inside, it just sat in the safe. Luckily the optic seems fine. At least it didn't leave acid everywhere like Alkalines normally do when they fail.However, there might still be a place for these. I've tested the AA versions longevity directly against Energizer and Bevigor lasted very slightly longer on average (of only 3 samples) when used to power a fan continuously until they die (in about 6-7 hours). That's a long of bang for the buck for power output as far as AA's go.I suspect the failure has something to do with low power usage over a long period of time, as I've read multiple complaints about the longevity of this brand when used in trail cameras (which use constant, low power to run a motion sensor), and the first time I put one of mine into a device that runs constantly (but at low power), mine fails prematurely.I have other AA and AAA devices that I think are a lot less likely to induce the problem, and it might be worth buying Bevigor for those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for Blink Doorbell
reviews.reviewText: I was getting tired of changing the battery in our Blink at work. Not anymore! I don't know what kind of magic sauce they put in these batteries, but we put the first two in over a month ago and still haven't had to change the batteries. These things are bussin'! And our Blink gets used constantly by people coming in and out of the biz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seem to work well and last as long as everready lithium battery for a fraction of the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for value
reviews.reviewText: These lithium batteries are about 2/3rd of the price of name brand batteries. So far they are working like a champ. I'm not rating the longevity as I've only used them for about three weeks. I'll know better in about three months -- that is the only reason I rated them 4 starts. Also the box was opened, and my battery tester doesn't work on lithium batteries -- so I don't know the state of all the batteries.
